mapper.select: select o.order_id, oi.order_item_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.order_price, o.user_id, o.ORDER_DATE, oi.review_status from orders o, order_item oi where o.order_id = oi.order_id and oi.user_id=#{user_id} and o.status='결제완료' and oi.review_status = 'on'
select count(*) from orders o, order_item oi where o.order_id = oi.order_id and oi.user_id=#{user_id} and o.status='결제완료' and oi.review_status = 'on'
mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_id, user_id, merchant_uid, total_price, payment_type, status, address, order_date, request_type) values (order_id_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{merchant_uid}, #{total_price}, #{payment_type}, #{status}, #{address}, sysdate, #{request_type})
insert into order_item(order_item_id, order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_price) values(order_item_id_seq.nextval, #{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, #{order_price})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS order_count, SUM(total_price) AS total_sum FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId}
